accost.name: Accost
accost.desc:
If agile, user may continue a round of battle.
Activation: (User's AS - foe's AS + [user's HP/2])%

reference.Character:

Jamke
Naoise
Midir
Asaello
Iucharba

adept.name: Adept
adept.desc:
May strike foe two successive times, if user is faster.
Activation: (AS + 20)%

astra.desc:
May strike foe five successive times.
Activation: (Skill)%

bargain.name: Bargain
bargain.desc: The user gets a 50% discount at castle merchants.

canto.name: Canto
canto.desc: Allows the user to move again and use up any leftover movement distance.

charm.name: Charm
charm.desc: Gives a 10% boost to nearby allies' hit and avoid.

critical.name: Critical
critical.desc:
User can inflict critical hits, doubling attack power.
Critical rate: (Skill + kill bonus)%

dance.name: Dance
dance.desc: Refreshes adjacent allies, allowing them to act again.

luna.name: Luna
luna.desc:
May negate the foe's defense.
Activation: (Skill)%

miracle.name: Miracle
miracle.desc:
May endure lethal hits in a pinch.
Activation: If user's HP ≤ 10

reference.Items:

Miracle Ring
Miracle Sword
Tyrfing

nihil.name: Nihil
nihil.desc: User is immune to critical hits, skills, and crippling hits.

pavise.name: Pavise
pavise.desc:
May protect user from all damage dealt by an attack.
Activation: (User's level)%

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.desc: Allows the user to double attack if attack speed exceeds foe's.

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc: Heals all of the user's HP at the beginning of the user's phase.

renewal.name: Renewal
renewal.desc: Restores 5-10 HP to the user every turn.

return.name: Return
return.desc: Returns the user to the main castle when triggered.

sol.name: Sol
sol.desc:
May drain foe's HP to heal user.
Activation: (Skill)%

steal.name: Steal
steal.desc: Successful hits steal gold from foes.

vantage.name: Vantage
vantage.desc:
User will always strike first in a pinch.
Activation: If user's HP ≤ 50% and foe initiates combat

reference.Character:

Lex
Dalvin
Iuchar

Hannibal

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.desc:
User deals critical hits in a pinch.
Activation: If user's HP ≤ (Max HP/2)+1

holysword.name: Holy Sword
holysword.desc:
(??)% chance to trigger on user's or foe's strike.
**User:** Increases damage by 20.
**Foe:** Decreases damage by 20.

darknesssword.name: Darkness Sword
darknesssword.desc:
(??)% chance to trigger on user's or foe's strike.
**User:** Multiplies damage by 1, 2 or 3.
**Foe:** Decreases damage by 20.
